#!/bin/bash
case "$1" in
    start)
        echo "Starting service..."
        systemctl start myapp
        ;;
    stop)
        echo "Stopping service..."
        systemctl stop myapp
        ;;
    restart)
        $0 stop
        sleep 2
        $0 start
        ;;
    status)
        systemctl status myapp
        ;;
    *)
        echo "Usage: $0 {start|stop|restart|status}"
        exit 1
        ;;
esac
